A technique that transforms the earth surrounding the user into a [[Wikipedia:Fluid|fluid]], allowing them to close in on the enemy with high speed by swimming underground. Since being under the ground is a blind spot, the target has no warning; allowing the user to launch a surprise attack. By using this technique in conjunction with a weapon, it also gains great effect as an "assault ninjutsu".

Kisame combines this with [[Samehada]], allowing it to protrude from the ground, like a shark's dorsal fin.
